nodes.text: "The Recruit, Part 1" (German title "Der Rekrut, Teil 1") is a comic strip written by Alec Worley, drawn by Ingo Römling, colored by Cosmo White and edited by Gunther Nickel. The story was published in the 1st issue of the German Star Wars Resistance Animation-Magazine, which was released on May 15, 2019.
The comic partially adapts the first episode of the television series Star Wars Resistance.
